document.full_text: when the seattle mariners cut the troubled milton bradley last week, they opened a spot for a player with a deep appreciation of his chance. outfielder mike wilson, who spent 10 seasons in the team's farm system, earned his first promotion to the majors.
document.title: a long time coming for mariners outfielder
lines_and_colors: when the seattle mariners cut the troubled milton bradley last week, they opened a spot for a player with a deep appreciation of his chance. outfielder mike wilson, who spent 10 seasons in the team's farm system, earned his first promotion to the majors.
